description: Developed and maintained websites for various clients, ensuring responsive design and optimal performance. Collaborated closely with clients to meet their specific needs and deliver high-quality solutions.
Worked on building web solutions and gained hands-on experience with modern web development practices and team collaboration.

Building a social media platform with real-time features using Next.js, tRPC, and Socket.io. Implemented image optimization with ImageKit and designed scalable database architecture with Prisma and PostgreSQL.
